## RouterLinkProps.ariaCurrentValue property

Value passed to the attribute `aria-current` when the link is exact active. Defaults to "page"

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ariaCurrentValue?: 'page' | 'step' | 'location' | 'date' | 'time' | 'true' | 'false';
```
